mapper.select: SELECT *, CONCAT(SPLIT_PART(SI_ADDRESS ::VARCHAR, ' ', 2), ' ', SPLIT_PART(SI_ADDRESS ::VARCHAR, ' ', 3)) AS SI_ADDR, COALESCE((SELECT AVG(UR_STAR) FROM USER_REVIEW UR WHERE UR.SI_CODE = SI.SI_CODE), 0) AS SI_STAR, ROUND((COALESCE((SELECT AVG(UR_STAR) FROM USER_REVIEW UR WHERE UR.SI_CODE = SI.SI_CODE), 0)/10), 2) AS SI_STARS FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN ORDERS O ON SI.SI_CODE = O.SI_CODE WHERE O.U_ID = #{u_id} ORDER BY RANDOM()

SELECT *, CONCAT(SPLIT_PART(SI_ADDRESS ::VARCHAR, ' ', 2), ' ', SPLIT_PART(SI_ADDRESS ::VARCHAR, ' ', 3)) AS SI_ADDR, COALESCE((SELECT AVG(UR_STAR) FROM USER_REVIEW UR WHERE UR.SI_CODE = SI.SI_CODE), 0) AS SI_STAR, ROUND((COALESCE((SELECT AVG(UR_STAR) FROM USER_REVIEW UR WHERE UR.SI_CODE = SI.SI_CODE), 0)/10), 2) AS SI_STARS FROM STORE_INFO SI ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 8

SELECT *, CONCAT(SPLIT_PART(SI_ADDRESS ::VARCHAR, ' ', 2), ' ', SPLIT_PART(SI_ADDRESS ::VARCHAR, ' ', 3)) AS SI_ADDR, COALESCE((SELECT AVG(UR_STAR) FROM USER_REVIEW UR WHERE UR.SI_CODE = SI.SI_CODE), 0) AS SI_STAR, ROUND((COALESCE((SELECT AVG(UR_STAR) FROM USER_REVIEW UR WHERE UR.SI_CODE = SI.SI_CODE), 0)/10), 2) AS SI_STARS FROM STORE_INFO SI WHERE SI_REG_DATE >= (SELECT CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 MONTHS') ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 8
